title: General
fullText:
Wiring enclosures shall be installed in accordance with safe and sound practice and provide adequate protection as required by Clauses 3.3 and 3.10.3.2 to 3.10.3.9.
Wiring enclosures installed on roofing material shall not be installed in a manner that—
(a) obstructs the natural water drain paths; or
(b) promotes the accumulation of debris. This may be achieved by—
(i) installing the enclosure across the roofing material profile; or
(ii) installing the enclosure within the valley or tray of the roofing material using supports that prevent the obstruction or water or accumulation of debris, e.g. standoff brackets or blocks.
